pages.text: MFFS $(5)Identification Card$() are used in combination with the $(l:mffs:machines/biometric_identifier)Biometric Identifier$() to govern the rights and privileges of players.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Before an Identification Card can be used, it needs to be assigned to a player. An Identification Card can be assigned to yourself by shift-right-clicking while holding the card. You can also shift-right-click other players to assign the card to them. Activate the card again to clear the stored identity.
